response.explain: The previous action code has successfully turned on the stove. However, the carrot is not yet cooked because it is not inside the saucepot which is on the stove. The next step is to cook the carrot.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the carrot from the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the stove.
(6) Grasp the saucepot from the stove.
(7) Put the carrot into the saucepot.
(8) Put the saucepot back onto the stove.
(9) Turn on the stove.
(10) Cook the carrot.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 10: Cook the carrot
    carrot = registry(env,"carrot_151")
    cook(robot, carrot)
    donothing(env)
